oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Geedville girls win Cannon County tourney, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about the Geedville girls in the basketball tournament. The caption reads: “Here are the Geedville girls of the Fifth District of Cannon county who breezed through to win the Cannon county elementary basketball tournament. First row, left to right: Virginia Smithson, Juanita Smithson, Lora Rogers, and Ruby Mitchell. Back row: Georgia Lee Young, Marjorie Davenport, Coach William Rogers, Fern Smithson and Iown? Young. Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Basketball--Tournaments
Cannon County (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Basketball coaches--Tennessee--Cannon County; Women basketball coaches--Tennessee--Cannon County
